content:
the Review sat down with thirdyear lacrosse players and identical twins Matthew and Daniel Fineman to discuss their chemistry on the field parental mixups and life after Oberlin PERIOD

Brenna SheldonFebruary  

When did you start playing lacrosse

M Fourth grade PERIOD

Did you play other sports growing up

M We played football ice hockey roller hockey soccer and baseball PERIOD

D We were miserable at baseball PERIOD They put us in the outfield where they put all the bad players PERIOD

M It was boring because no one ever hit balls out there PERIOD

D But we got lots of free ice cream out of it PERIOD

Do you work well together on the lacrosse field

M Yes PERIOD We know how to work together and I know how he plays PERIOD We understand each others flaws and strengths PERIOD

D On the field during games we work well together PERIOD

M I play defender and he plays long stick middie PERIOD

D He makes lots of assists to me PERIOD We work well together because weve played together for so long PERIOD

What about off the field

M We bicker PERIOD

D A lot PERIOD But its better than it used to be PERIOD

Can you read each others minds

D Reading minds doesnt exist PERIOD

M But weve spent more time together over the past  years than most couples whove been married for  years PERIOD

D So our train of thought is similar PERIOD We can finish each others sentences PERIOD

What is your best lacrosse memory

M When we were sophomores in high school PERIOD

D We were down three points and had two minutes left in the game and we came back to beat them on their home field on senior night PERIOD

Does being twins ever get you into trouble with girls

M We avoid the same girls PERIOD

D Yeah as soon as one of us gets with her its over PERIOD Itd be like water and oil if we both got with the same girl they just dont mix PERIOD

What are your most noticeable physical differences

M Ive got thicker cheekbones PERIOD

D I have a skinnier face PERIOD I also always wear a watch PERIOD

M Thats cheating PERIOD

Do your parents ever mix you up

M If were driving in the car sometimes my dad mixes us up if hes not looking at us PERIOD But theyre pretty good PERIOD

D They used to paint one of our pinky nails purple to tell us apart PERIOD And when we were first born they called us Baby One and Baby Two PERIOD

M I cant tell our baby pictures apart PERIOD

So what are your personality differences

D Im a quieter person PERIOD

M But hes also angrier PERIOD

D I have a short fuse PERIOD

Do you ever do twin swaps Have one of you ever gone to classes for the other

M Not classes because that doesnt help us PERIOD

D But if Im talking to someone and they guess my name wrong Ill be like yeah Im Matt PERIOD Especially if theyve known me for a while and still cant figure it out PERIOD

How did you decide on Oberlin

M Our dad came here PERIOD You know legacy PERIOD

D We just love the snow what can I say

M Yeah we love Ohio

What are your future plans for life and lacrosse

M I would like to find a job in biology field research PERIOD And lacrosse  beer leagues in the summer otherwise there is not much to do in the sport PERIOD

D Id like to play lacrosse on an occasional basis in tournaments but there is not much you can do after college unless you are one of the best Division I players PERIOD So I plan to go back to climbing and pick up other sports PERIOD As for life Im not sure PERIOD I hope to do something I am passionate about PERIOD
